name: Final Party
description:
Final Party is a turn-based RPG using the "Rock Paper Scissors" game as the battle system ! We used that because the theme was "based on luck" and the concept of "Rock Paper Scissors" fits well the game.

We only saw yesterday the jam so we did pretty much everything in one day (aside our tools) including pixel art, music & programming.

-- Team --
  • HydroGene : Code and Musics
  • D3nX : Code and Pixel Art
  • Yukiwi (D3nX little sister) : Draw for us the "Rock Paper Scissor" icons in battle!
-- Controls --
  • Arrow keys : Move
  •  X / Space / Enter : Validate in battle

We hope you'll enjoy it !
